titles.title: Earthquake Insurance Affordability Act

A bill to establish a program to provide guarantees for debt issued by or on behalf of State catastrophe insurance programs to assist in the financial recovery from earthquakes, earthquake-induced landslides, volcanic eruptions, and tsunamis.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1845-1846)
